backend/main.mo: Marketplace canister implementing access control, user and seller profiles, and listing management with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file documenting implemented publishing-related features, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend React components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps pages in AppLayout, and configures theming and toast UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button that manages authentication state and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Displays the app's logo and animated mascot images.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Reusable empty state component showing an icon, message, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Reusable loading component with a spinning icon and loading message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout providing header, footer, background pattern, navigation, and slot for page content.
frontend/src/components/listings/Categor: Category filter UI allowing users to select listing categories via rounded buttons.
frontend/src/components/listings/ImageUp: Handles selecting up to three images, converting them to data URLs, and removing uploaded images.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Displays a listing with its image, title, price, and quantity, and triggers navigation on click.
Form for creating or editing listings, supporting presets, validation, and image uploads.
Renders a responsive grid of ListingCards with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/listings/listing: Provides predefined listing templates with preset titles, descriptions, prices, and quantities.
frontend/src/components/sellers/SellerDi: Fetches and displays a seller's display name with a loading fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateLi: Mutation hook to create a listing and invalidate related listing and seller queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateSe: Mutation hook to create a seller profile and refresh seller-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useDeactiva: Mutation hook to deactivate a listing and invalidate affected listing queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useSaveUser: Mutation hook to save the current user's profile and refresh the profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useUpdateLi: Mutation hook to update a listing and invalidate its detail and related lists.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Query hook to fetch the current user's profile with actor-aware loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useIsSeller.t: Query hook to check whether the current user is a seller.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListingDet: Query hook to fetch a single listing by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListings.t: Query hook to load all listings by aggregating listings from every seller.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMyListings: Query hook to fetch listings belonging to the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSellers.ts: Query hook to load a seller profile by principal with graceful failure handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with search, category filters, and a grid of listings fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed listing info with images, seller info, and owner-only deactivation actions.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile setup and displays the user’s listings, requiring authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/PublishingSharePage.t: Provides hosting info and lets users copy the public URL of the deployed marketplace.
frontend/src/pages/SellCreateListingPage: Allows authenticated users to create new listings using a form and submit them to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/SellEditListingPage.t: Provides an edit page for a listing, loading listing data, checking ownership, and submitting updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/utils/canisterErrors.ts: Parses canister and agent errors into cleaner user-facing messages with mappings for common backend error types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s schema, features, and current implementation state for the marketplace application.
